abstract: Second-quarter revenue came in below expectations and investors focused on slower growth. Shares lost 27 percent on Tuesday.
snippet: Second-quarter revenue came in below expectations and investors focused on slower growth. Shares lost 27 percent on Tuesday.
lead_paragraph: Shares of Groupon, the daily-deals Internet company, fell sharply on Tuesday as second-quarter revenue came in below expectations and investors focused on slower growth.

headline.main: Groupon Posts Mixed Results, and Stock Falls
headline.print_headline: Groupon’s Shares Fall on Results, Joining Zynga and Facebook in a Decline
